pages.text: The OPI is a puller that can insert into chests. It is placed alongside a belt, and only pulls items set in the filter if the connected inventory can accept it.

pages.title: OPI
pages.text: Notice the orange indicator on top: items will be moved towards that direction.
To enable filtering-functions, Right-click on the OPI. A GUI with 9 fields will open.$(br)If you leave it empty, everything will be pulled.$(br)When no items are added, the OPI will not operate.
The amount of one itemstack is not doing anything at the moment. In a future-update it will have functionality.
